price: 140. Soki bozoki mpota, bango mpe bazoki lokola. Na boye tozali kotambuisa mikolo okati na bato mpo ete Allah ayeba bandimi, mpe azua okati na bino baye bawei mpona kobunda na nzela naye, mpe Allah alingaka bato ya mabe te.
arabic: إِن يَمۡسَسۡكُمۡ قَرۡحٞ فَقَدۡ مَسَّ ٱلۡقَوۡمَ قَرۡحٞ مِّثۡلُهُۥۚ وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡأَيَّامُ نُدَاوِلُهَا بَيۡنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلِيَعۡلَمَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَيَتَّخِذَ مِنكُمۡ شُهَدَآءَۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: in yamsaskum qarḥun faqad massa al-qawma qarḥun mith'luhu watil'ka al-ayāmu nudāwiluhā bayna al-nāsi waliyaʿlama al-lahu alladhīna āmanū wayattakhidha minkum shuhadāa wal-lahu lā yuḥibbu al-ẓālimīna
